content: हर्षण (णा|णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हृष्-णिच् ल्यु] Causing delight, gladdening, delightful, pleasant. --णः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the five arrows of Kāmadeva. {@--2@} A morbid affection of the eyes. {@--3@} A deity presiding over the funeral ceremonies. --णं Joy, delight, happiness, gladdening, delighting; दुर्हृदामप्रहर्षाय सुहृदां हर्षणाय च <ls>Mb.</ls>
